data.lore: Maokai was bound to a gnarled tree by the dark magic that transformed the Shadow Isles. The once-peaceful nature spirit is now a corruption of his former self. Infused with power that he never asked for, he has become a destructive force, sundering his enemies with wild magic and oaken limbs. Maokai continues to wander Valoran, seeking the means to bring life back to his forest home.
data.name: Maokai
data.title: the Twisted Treant

spells.tooltip: Maokai releases an arcane shockwave. Nearby enemies are knocked back and all affected enemies take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are slowed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.
spells.description: Maokai knocks back nearby enemies with a shockwave, dealing magic damage and slowing them.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Maokai releases an arcane shockwave. Nearby enemies are knocked back and all affected enemies take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are slowed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.
spells.name: Arcane Smash
spells.sanitizedDescription: Maokai knocks back nearby enemies with a shockwave, dealing magic damage and slowing them.

spells.tooltip: Maokai transforms into a cloud of arcane energy that quickly travels to a target enemy, roots it for {{ e2 }} second(s) and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of the target's maximum health as magic damage (Max: {{ e3 }} to minions and monsters).
spells.description: Maokai dissolves into a cloud of arcane energies. He regrows near a target enemy, dealing damage and rooting it in place.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Maokai transforms into a cloud of arcane energy that quickly travels to a target enemy, roots it for {{ e2 }} second(s) and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of the target's maximum health as magic damage (Max: {{ e3 }} to minions and monsters).
spells.name: Twisted Advance
spells.sanitizedDescription: Maokai dissolves into a cloud of arcane energies. He regrows near a target enemy, dealing damage and rooting it in place.

spells.tooltip:
Maokai flings a sapling that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage on impact.

The sapling wards the nearby area, and will chase enemies that approach, exploding to deal {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage and slow enemies hit by {{ e5 }}% for {{ e3 }} second(s). Saplings last for {{ e4 }} seconds.
spells.description: Maokai flings a sapling that deals area damage on impact. The sapling then wards the nearby area. When enemies approach, the sapling attacks enemies with an arcane blast.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Maokai flings a sapling that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage on impact. The sapling wards the nearby area, and will chase enemies that approach, exploding to deal {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage and slow enemies hit by {{ e5 }}% for {{ e3 }} second(s). Saplings last for {{ e4 }} seconds.
spells.name: Sapling Toss
spells.sanitizedDescription: Maokai flings a sapling that deals area damage on impact. The sapling then wards the nearby area. When enemies approach, the sapling attacks enemies with an arcane blast.

spells.resource: {{ cost }} Mana, {{ e4 }} Mana Per Second
spells.tooltip:
Toggle: Maokai surrounds himself with a magical vortex that protects him and allied champions by reducing damage from non-turret sources by {{ e1 }}% for up to {{ e2 }} seconds.

Maokai can end the effect to release the stored energy, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+2 per damage absorbed) magic damage to enemies within the vortex. Maokai can store up to {{ e5 }} bonus damage.
spells.description: Maokai shields his allies by drawing power from hostile spells and attacks, reducing non-tower damage done to allied champions in the area. When Maokai ends the effect, he unleashes the absorbed energy to deal damage to enemies within the vortex.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Toggle: Maokai surrounds himself with a magical vortex that protects him and allied champions by reducing damage from non-turret sources by {{ e1 }}% for up to {{ e2 }} seconds. Maokai can end the effect to release the stored energy, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+2 per damage absorbed) magic damage to enemies within the vortex. Maokai can store up to {{ e5 }} bonus damage.
spells.name: Vengeful Maelstrom
spells.sanitizedDescription: Maokai shields his allies by drawing power from hostile spells and attacks, reducing non-tower damage done to allied champions in the area. When Maokai ends the effect, he unleashes the absorbed energy to deal damage to enemies within the vortex.

passive.name: Sap Magic
passive.description: Each time a spell is cast near Maokai he draws energy from it, gaining a charge of Magical Sap. When Maokai has 5 charges his next basic attack heals him for 7% of his max Health.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Each time a spell is cast near Maokai he draws energy from it, gaining a charge of Magical Sap. When Maokai has 5 charges his next basic attack heals him for 7% of his max Health.
